replyMessages.content: Octopus sees the user wants to know what Azure Stack HCI is and also wants to know the data schema when loading or pulling data from any source.

Azure Stack HCI is a portfolio of products that enables you to build and run hybrid applications across on-premises, edge locations, and cloud. It includes Azure Stack Hyperconverged Infrastructure (HCI), Azure Stack Hub, and Azure Stack Edge. Azure Stack HCI is a hyper-converged Windows Server 2019 cluster that uses validated hardware to run virtualized workloads on-premises. It is designed to help you modernize your datacenter and run virtualized workloads on-premises while taking advantage of cloud-based services.
